title: Execution Attestation v1
description: Attestation that a run executed in a specific isolation environment (sandbox/TEE).

agent_did.description: Agent DID that was executed. Must start with 'did:'.

attester_did.description: Attester DID (sandbox/TEE authority). Must start with 'did:'.

run_id.description: Optional binding to a specific run_id.

proof_bundle_hash_b64u.description: Optional binding to a proof bundle hash (base64url).

harness.description: Optional harness metadata (id/version/runtime/config hash) observed by the attester.

runtime_metadata.description: Optional environment claims (e.g. image hash, resource limits, network policy).
